p: Rutin from Tragia involerta docked with 3CL pro exhibits the energy value is −133.06 kcal/mol, which comprises of −85.08 van der Waal interaction and −47.99 kcal/mol hydrogen bonding interactions ( Figure 2C). Here, the main chain is arginine with H-S domain at the position 131 with binding energy −11.8 kcal/mol. Jasso-Miranda et al. ( 2019) and Zandi et al. ( 2011) studied the antiviral activity of Rutin against Dengue virus type-2.
